block.simpletransport.conveyor.tooltip: Basic conveyor-belt, just moves items. Does not insert or extract.
Emits a redstone signal when items are conveyed.
block.simpletransport.extractor.tooltip: Pulls items from an inventory and drops them on the belt.
block.simpletransport.extractor_upper.to: Pulls items from an inventory above it and drops them on the belt.
block.simpletransport.inserter.tooltip: Inserts items dropped in front of it in an attached inventory.
block.simpletransport.puller.tooltip: Pulls items in front of it and drops it on the other side.
